content.en: Cloud Manufacturing Algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different research questions in cloud manufacturing systems. These algorithms aim to achieve tasks such as multi-task oriented services composition and optimization, machining service modes and resource selection strategies, service composition and optimal selection of big manufacturing data, QoS-aware service composition, energy-aware resource allocation, task scheduling for individualized requirements, data mining for cloud manufacturing resource services, optimization technologies, distributed manufacturing resource selection strategy, cloud manufacturing service composition with service cooperation level evaluation, optimal service composition in complex manufacturing networks, multi-batch subtasks parallel-hybrid execution cloud service composition, multi-task scheduling, performance computation methods for composition of tasks with multiple patterns, dynamic service composition reconfiguration, task decomposition based on cloud manufacturing platform, cloud service composition of collaborative manufacturing, collaborative optimization for energy saving and service composition, rescheduling unreliable service providers, and multi-task green scheduling with diverse time-of-use prices. These algorithms play a crucial role in improving the efficiency and effectiveness of cloud manufacturing systems.
content.da: Skyproduktion Algoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål i skyproduktionssystemer. Disse algoritmer har til formål at udføre opgaver såsom fleropgave-orienteret servicekomposition og optimering, bearbejdningsservicetilstande og ressourceudvælgelsesstrategier, servicekomposition og optimal udvælgelse af store produktiondata, QoS-bevidst servicekomposition, energibevidst ressourceallokering, opgaveplanlægning for individuelle krav, data mining til skyproduktionsressourcetjenester, optimeringsteknologier, distribueret udvælgelsesstrategi for produktionsressourcer, skyproduktion servicekomposition med serviceniveauevaluering, optimal servicekomposition i komplekse produktionsnetværk, flerbatches underopgaver parallel-hybrid udførelses skyservicekomposition, fleropgaveplanlægning, performanceberegningsmetoder for sammensætning af opgaver med flere mønstre, dynamisk servicekompositionsomkonfiguration, opgavedecomposition baseret på skyproduktionsplatform, skyservicekomposition for kollaborativ produktion, kollaborativ optimering for energibesparelse og servicekomposition, omlægning af upålidelige serviceudbydere, og fleropgave grøn planlægning med forskellige tidsbrugspriser. Disse algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i at forbedre effektiviteten og effektiviteten af skyproduktionssystemer.
